briefTitle: The Andromeda Study.Predictive Value of Combined Criteria to Tailor Breast Cancer Screening.
officialTitle: Predictive Value of Combined Criteria to Tailor Breast Cancer Screening and New Opportunities From Circulating Markers. The Andromeda Study.
primaryOutcomeMeasure: PPV (Positive Predictive Value) of BC risk factors
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* All women undergoing a screening mammography in the participating centers.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Women unable to give informed consent
